short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulates mouse and keyboard events on specified pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Simulator is designed for simulating mouse and keyboard events on web pages, facilitating the testing and automation of user interactions for beginners. It enables developers and QA professionals to automate clicks and key presses, thus streamlining the testing process. The extension offers basic scripting and website whitelisting, as well as messaging passing with whitelisted extensions. It supports precise control over event timing and sequence, making it suitable for testing dynamic and interactive web applications.
